pages.text:
OUR SERVICE
SERVING THOSE WHO SERVE US
Misson
about us
“Heroes Bar & Liberty Lounge strives to be a welcoming place for Veterans, Active-Duty Military, and First Responders like Police, Fire Fighters, EMTs, Nurses, and Doctors — all modern-day heroes — to relax and be respected for the service they provide and have provided to our country and our fellow citizens.”
Heroes Bar & Liberty Lounge is a pub (1st floor) and craft cocktail lounge (2nd floor) located in a 100-year old building in the heart of the historic district of Old Town in Key West, FL. We LOVE & support our Military, Police, Fire & EMS personnel! We also love to serve Teachers, Doctors, Nurses, Veterinarians and anyone who serves and helps others.
We’re just a half block from Duval Street. Come in and relax, meet new friends, enjoy your favorite drink and listen to live music featuring some of the BEST musicians on the island. We serve local beers, ales, vodkas, rums, and liquors for sipping and mixing.
We feature the full NFL package so you can keep up with your teams. Many of our patrons come in impressed and leave saying it is their new pub of choice.
We hope you will choose Heroes Bar &  Liberty Lounge for your new pub of choice.
Heroes Bar
Pub Bar
Happy Hour
Heroes & Military Discounts
LIVE Music
Liberty Lounge
Cocktail Lounge
